Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program is a rocket flight simulator but when I found the blimp mod I found that I have developed an affinity for airships, maybe thats just the steampunk fan in me.

So the question is, what fun uses have you found for KSP that were not initially intended?
C7 planes. Although this will be intended in the game soon, i thought i would never like it, but i turned out loving it.

There are mods for submarines, articulated robotic arms with claws, silly wooden parts, Legos... Great googly moogly, I could be here for a long time.

Dirigibles, you say? I\'ve got to get me one of these!

Some of the stuff has already been said before. Sorry about that.

C7 aircraft (I do this more than rocketry )

Submarines

Sea going vessels (this includes Ground Effect Vehicles).

Blimps

Cars

and other...
